articles.title: Elon Musk and other tech leaders call for pause in 'out of control' AI race - CNN
articles.description: Some of the biggest names in tech are calling for artificial intelligence labs to stop the training of the most powerful AI systems for at least six months, citing "profound risks to society and humanity."
